languages.text: "Наш союз подобен чуду цветущего оазиса посреди яростного жара пустыни. Я счастлива быть вашим партнером, и другом, и союзником в борьбе с врагом".
"Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am glad to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."
languages.original_text: "Наш союз подобен чуду цветущего оазиса посреди яростного жара пустыни. Я счастлива быть вашим партнером, и другом, и союзником в борьбе с врагом".

traits.locale_text: "Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am happy to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."
"Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am happy to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."
"Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am happy to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."
"Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am glad to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."

languages.text: 「アタシらの同盟は灼熱の砂漠で奇跡的に湧くオアシスみたいなもんだ。アンタのパートナー、友人、そして敵と戦う盟友であることが嬉しいよ」
languages.original_text: "Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am glad to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."

traits.locale_text: 「アタシらの同盟は灼熱の砂漠で奇跡的に湧くオアシスみたいなもんだ。アンタのパートナー、友人、そして敵と戦う盟友であることが嬉しいよ」

languages.text: “我们的情谊就像酷热沙漠中奇迹般绽放的丰茂绿洲一般。我很高兴能成为你的伙伴、你的朋友，以及与你并肩作战的战友。”
languages.original_text: "Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am glad to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."

traits.locale_text: “我们的情谊就像酷热沙漠中奇迹般绽放的丰茂绿洲一般。我很高兴能成为你的伙伴、你的朋友，以及与你并肩作战的战友。”

languages.text: "Unser Bündnis ist wie eine wundersame Oase, die in der sengenden Wüstenhitze erblüht. Ich bin froh, Eure Partnerin zu sein, Eure Freundin und Eure Verbündete im Kampf gegen den Feind."
languages.original_text: "Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am glad to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."

traits.locale_text: "Unser Bündnis ist wie eine wundersame Oase, die in der sengenden Wüstenhitze erblüht. Ich bin froh, Eure Partnerin zu sein, Eure Freundin und Eure Verbündete im Kampf gegen den Feind."

languages.text: «Nuestra alianza es como un oasis milagroso en el calor del desierto. Es un placer ser su compañera, su amiga y su aliada en la lucha contra el enemigo».
languages.original_text: "Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am glad to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestra alianza es como un oasis milagroso en el calor del desierto. Es un placer ser su compañera, su amiga y su aliada en la lucha contra el enemigo».

languages.text: « Notre alliance est comme une oasis miraculeuse qui s'épanouit dans la chaleur torride du désert. Je suis heureuse d'être votre partenaire, votre amie et votre alliée dans le combat contre l'ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am glad to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."

traits.locale_text: « Notre alliance est comme une oasis miraculeuse qui s'épanouit dans la chaleur torride du désert. Je suis heureuse d'être votre partenaire, votre amie et votre alliée dans le combat contre l'ennemi. »

languages.text: "İttifakımız, çölün azılı hararetinde doğmayı başarmış mucizevi bir vaha gibi. Düşmanına karşı verdiğin savaşta ortağın, dostun ve müttefikin olduğum için çok mutluyum."
languages.original_text: "Our alliance is like a miraculous oasis blooming in the fierce desert heat. I am glad to be your partner, and friend, and ally in the fight against the enemy."
